title: A Level Sociology - Categorisations in Schools
description: Richard looks at how schools categorise students and the impact it can have for your A Level Sociology exam. Ideal for preparing you for your A Level Sociology exam. For more info visit www.senecalearning.com
dc:creator: Seneca Learning Revision
